resources.string:
1.Sensors will be activated in every 10sec for 1sec only.

 2.If same number calls more than 5 times, profile will be changed to NORMAL MODE.

 3.If LIGHT less than 10 LUX, profile will be changed to VIBRATE MODE.

 4.If mobile is in pocket, profile will be changed to VIBRATE MODE.

 5.If mobile screen is FLIPPED DOWN, profile will be changed to SILENT MODE.
